name: Aaaaaaaa Sheep: The SheepWolf Simulator
description:
A wolf who thinks he is a sheep dog.

Use your voice to control the wolf

(NB: This game requires a microphone to play.)

Go = Forward
Come by = Turn Left
Away = Turn Right

Lie Down = Slow down / stop

Stop  = Stop straight away

Get all the sheep in the pen.

This is our first ever game.
